title: Trailer Tuesday – Peculiar Cow Vice
description: Trailer Tuesday joins llamas at war, roughs up pigs for financial gain, and tries to save a dog from Halloween monsters this week. Panic In The Woods “Lost in a creepy forest,... The post Trailer Tuesday – Peculiar Cow Vice appeared first on Indie Games Plus.
author: Joel Couture
categories: A Death in the Red Light
excerpt: Trailer Tuesday joins llamas at war, roughs up pigs for financial gain, and tries to save a dog from Halloween monsters this week.
text: Trailer Tuesday joins llamas at war, roughs up pigs for financial gain, and tries to save a dog from Halloween monsters this week. Panic In The Woods “Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!” Panic in the Woods is available now on Steam. Nimbusfall “Step into the shoes of the last survivor of a race decimated by The Moon, now seeking to settle the score with the culprit of its extinction. But what secrets does The Moon hold?” Nimbusfall is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam. Cricket: Jae’s Really Peculiar Game “Join Jae as he goes on a journey with his best friends to try and fix the past in a story full of laughs, tears, and Elemelons. Engage in silly battles that involve timed hits, meter, and teamwork.” Cricket: Jae’s Really Peculiar Game is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Epic Games Store, and Steam. A Death in the Red Light “Explore the seedy underbelly of Europe’s most notorious city, solve complex puzzles, and crack the case while experiencing Amsterdam at its worst.” A Death in the Red Light is available now on Steam. Cash Cow DX “Holy cow, it’s all about the moooney! Run, jump and slide in this udderly moo-velous adventure to reclaim your fortunes from those sneaky Pig Pockets.” Cash Cow DX is available now on the Nintendo eShop, GOG, and Steam. Coin-Op Vice “The feature of Coin-Op VICE is the variety of short mini-games that provide different weapons and enhance the hero’s characteristics.” Coin-Op Vice is available now on Steam. Planetiles “Build and transform barren planets into flourishing worlds. Outwit natural disasters, develop vibrant habitats, and navigate complex challenges.” Planetiles is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam. Aura of Worlds “Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you utilize creative abilities & wield the environment to your advantage. Blast, dash, grapple, fight, and charm your way through ever-changing labyrinths & outwit powerful guardians!” Aura of Worlds is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam. HorrorVale “Help Alice on her quest to save her dog from strange and unusual monsters who suddenly showed up in HorrorVale!” HorrorVale is available now on itch.io and Steam. Speedollama “Bursting with quirky humor and vibrant pixelated carnage, this game is not for the faint of heart. Are you ready to embrace the chaos and prove your skills?” Speedollama is available now on Steam. About The Author Joel Couture Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
html:
Trailer Tuesday joins llamas at war, roughs up pigs for financial gain, and tries to save a dog from Halloween monsters this week.

Panic In The Woods

“Lost in a creepy forest, you and your friends are hunted by a monster. Stay quiet while extracting keys through nightmarish realms using items like traps, sonars, and flare guns to survive!”

Panic in the Woods is available now on Steam.

Nimbusfall

“Step into the shoes of the last survivor of a race decimated by The Moon, now seeking to settle the score with the culprit of its extinction. But what secrets does The Moon hold?”

Nimbusfall is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam.

Cricket: Jae’s Really Peculiar Game

“Join Jae as he goes on a journey with his best friends to try and fix the past in a story full of laughs, tears, and Elemelons. Engage in silly battles that involve timed hits, meter, and teamwork.”

Cricket: Jae’s Really Peculiar Game is available now on the Nintendo eShop, PlayStation Store, Epic Games Store, and Steam.

A Death in the Red Light

“Explore the seedy underbelly of Europe’s most notorious city, solve complex puzzles, and crack the case while experiencing Amsterdam at its worst.”

A Death in the Red Light is available now on Steam.

Cash Cow DX

“Holy cow, it’s all about the moooney! Run, jump and slide in this udderly moo-velous adventure to reclaim your fortunes from those sneaky Pig Pockets.”

Cash Cow DX is available now on the Nintendo eShop, GOG, and Steam.

Coin-Op Vice

“The feature of Coin-Op VICE is the variety of short mini-games that provide different weapons and enhance the hero’s characteristics.”

Coin-Op Vice is available now on Steam.

Planetiles

“Build and transform barren planets into flourishing worlds. Outwit natural disasters, develop vibrant habitats, and navigate complex challenges.”

Planetiles is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam.

Aura of Worlds

“Explore multiple dangerous worlds where you utilize creative abilities & wield the environment to your advantage. Blast, dash, grapple, fight, and charm your way through ever-changing labyrinths & outwit powerful guardians!”

Aura of Worlds is available now on the Nintendo eShop and Steam.

HorrorVale

“Help Alice on her quest to save her dog from strange and unusual monsters who suddenly showed up in HorrorVale!”

HorrorVale is available now on itch.io and Steam.

Speedollama

“Bursting with quirky humor and vibrant pixelated carnage, this game is not for the faint of heart. Are you ready to embrace the chaos and prove your skills?”

Speedollama is available now on Steam.

About The Author

Joel Couture

Joel has been covering indie games for various sites including IndieGames.com, Siliconera, Gamasutra, Warp Door, CG Magazine, and more over the past seven years, and has written book-length studies on Undertale and P.T.. Joel is constantly on the lookout for digital experiences that push the boundaries of what games can be, and seeks to delve into the creative process, meanings, and emotion labor that goes into the work of artists worldwide.
